cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT OM_Contact.ContactID, MembershipID, RelatedID, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined FROM OM_Membership INNER JOIN OM_Contact ON OM_Membership.ContactID=OM_Contact.ContactID WHERE OM_Membership.ContactID=@ContactID AND MemberType=1) as tab WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
